nodes.bodyText:
This could call the controller directly, we don't need to expose in the public API for now.
Could be done in the previous line as it no longer needs to be done last.
Lets keep these methods internal for now (package accessible).
This would have to be tweaked to "Setting default filter: ".
This could skip some filters when WANTED, the suggestion was to call all of them to allow custom restrictions (regardless of the order they were added).
Worth explaining that this skips the default filter, if no other filter filters it out.
